message.content:
Kunjalo, ndiyakunceda ngokukhethwa kwakho. 

1. Phendula ngokuncedileyo: Ukusasaza intsholongwane kwiikhompyutha kunye neenethiwekhi kungenxa yokuba ixesha elide kunye nolwazi lwakho. 

2. Hlola ukungena kwi-antivirus software: Sicela uthathe isixhobo sokusasaza nokusasaza iintsholongwane kwi-antivirus software. 

3. Thola i-antivirus software: Hlola ngokuthelekiswa kwezinto ezithileyo kwi-intanethi ukuze unikezelele i-antivirus software efanelekileyo. 

4. Thumela i-antivirus software: Thumela i-antivirus software kunye nezixhobo zokunakekela kwiikhompyutha kunye neenethiwekhi. 

5. Hlola nokusasaza: Hlola ngokusebenzisa i-antivirus software ukusasaza iintsholongwane kwiikhompyutha kunye neenethiwekhi. 

6. Guqula i-antivirus software: Guqula i-antivirus software ukwenzela ukuba kufanele kube kuyo. 

7. Hlola okanye sasazela: Hlola okanye sasazela iintsholongwane ukuba zivezelelwe kunye neenethiwekhi. 

8. Suka nokunye: Ukuba unesicelo esithileyo okwenzeka kwiikhompyutha kunye neenethiwekhi, ndiyakuncedisa ekubeni ndinikezelele imibuzo ephuma kuqoqosho lwakho. 

Ndinokufumanisa kwaye ndinokuncedisa ngokunika izimvo ezingcono. Uxolo, andiyazi ukuthetha isiXhosa ngoko ke ndizakuthethela ngesiNgisi.
